display_name: Sleep Habits (SHHS2): Fall asleep while sitting and talking
description: 19. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep (not just "feel tired") in each of the following situations? (Check one box for each situation.  If you are never or rarely in the situation, please give your best guess for what would happen.)  f. Sitting and talking to someone

hybrid.LABEL: SH 19f Sitting and talking to someone
